abstract: Choreographer Sally Silvers will oversee dance series A Prize Every Time at Roulette in Brooklyn; series incorporates 'live choreography,' in which teams of choreographers, directors and dancers create pieces, from the first ideas to finished projects, in front of audience.
snippet: In “A Prize Every Time” the choreographer Sally Silvers will oversee teams creating dances, from the first ideas to finished projects, in front of audiences at Roulette in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: In “A Prize Every Time” the choreographer Sally Silvers will oversee teams creating dances, from the first ideas to finished projects, in front of audiences at Roulette in Brooklyn.

headline.main: Choreographing as Fast as They Can
headline.print_headline: Choreographing as Fast as They Can
headline.seo: Sally Silvers’s ‘Prize Every Time’ at Roulette in Brooklyn
